message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget is quite limited. Would you consider reducing the price to $15000?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $18000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16500. This is a great compromise that still reflects the value of the product, but also takes into account your budget constraints.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, would you be able to lower the price to $14500?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm still getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $16000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, and I hope you can see the value in the product at this price point.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Considering the product's value and my budget, could you possibly reduce the price to $15000?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're getting close to your budget, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.
